subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Troy Grosenick made 20 saves and Union won its first Division I hockey tournament game, beating Michigan State, 3-1, in the first round of the Bridgeport Regional.
snippet: Troy Grosenick made 20 saves and Union won its first Division I hockey tournament game, beating Michigan State, 3-1, in the first round of the Bridgeport Regional.
